logger

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • logger.Logger

  • public class Logger
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    cory The client side log functions for interactiing with the rifffish database.

      • Logger

        public Logger()
        Creates a logger that uses a default Offline logging scheme

      • Logger

        public Logger(boolean internetEnabled,
              int numberOfTransactions)
        Creates a logger that sends logs to a remote server after a set amount of transactions
        Parameters:
        numberOfTransactions - the number of transactions that need to occur before they are sent to the server. 0 = immediately

      • Logger

        public Logger(boolean internetEnabled,
              LogDate date)
        Creates a Logger that sends the logs to a remote server at a set time
        Parameters:
        internetEnabled, - true/false
        date - the set time logging scheme to use
